Notes: On 2020-03-23, England required closure of all schools (public, private, sixth forms, and colleges) except for children of key workers and vulnerable children, as confirmed by both the official GOV.UK and BBC articles. Per OxCGRT guidelines, this is scored as 3 (require closing all levels), since exceptions for key workers' children and vulnerable children are explicitly included under a general closure. Confidence: high, no ambiguity.
